---
name: Bug report
about: Tell us about an issue with any plugin in this repository
title: "[Plugin Name] Bug description..."
labels: bug
assignees: ''

---

!!! Test if the bug is present in the latest release first !!!

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Additional information**
This information will make finding and fixing the bug much easier.
 - OS: [e.g. Windows11, SteamOS (if on Linux also specify Wine/Proton version)]
 - Exact plugin/release version that introduced this issue [e.g. v1.0.1, r12.1, Always existed]
 - Upload your output_log.txt after triggering the issue (drag the file in here)
      You can find output_log in the game root directory. If the file does not exist, edit doorstop_config.ini and set `redirect_output_log = true`
